mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM (CHATROOM_NO, USER_ID_ONE, USER_ID_TWO) VALUES ((select nvl(max(chatroom_no),0) from chatroom)+1, #{user_id_one}, #{user_id_two})

insert into MESSAGE ( MSG_NO, MSG_SENDER, MSG_RECEIVER, MSG_CONTENT, MSG_SENDTIME, CHATROOM_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(MSG_NO),0) FROM MESSAGE)+1, #{msg_sender}, #{msg_receiver}, #{msg_content}, systimestamp, #{chatroom_no})
